msg: According to the weather forecast, it may rain soon.
txt:
A: これから公園に行って遊ぼうよ。
A: Let's go to the park and play.
B: 天気予報によると、もうすぐ雨が降るよ。
B: According to the weather forecast, it (　　　) rain soon.
correctText: According to the weather forecast, it (will) rain soon.

msg: It was interesting, but I went swimming in the ocean and I was tired.
txt:
A: 沖縄への旅行はどうだった？
A: How was your vacation to Okinawa?
B: 楽しかったよ、ただ海で泳いで疲れたね。
B: It (　　　) interesting, but I went swimming in the ocean and I was tired.
correctText: It (was) interesting, but I went swimming in the ocean and I was tired.

msg: He often come to my house.
txt:
A: 彼はよく僕の家に来るんだ。
A: He often (　　　) to my house.
B: そうなんだ、彼と君はとても仲がいいんだね。
B: Wow, he and you are very close.

msg: Spanish is spoke in Spain so I have to study.
txt:
A: いつかスペインに行ってみたいな。
A: I want to go to Spain someday.
B: スペインではスペイン語が話されるから勉強しなくちゃ。
B: Spanish is (　　　) in Spain so I have to study.
correctText: Spanish is (spoken) in Spain so I have to study.
